Full service R&D platform for
microbe-based biomanufacturing

From Laboratory Research to Industrial Scale-Up & Technology Transfer

Find out more

Work with Our Experts

With decades of microbial engineering expertise and over 15+ years of industrial fermentation experience, our team supports projects at every stage, from academic proof-of-concept scale-ups to production demonstrations for startups. We also provide consulting on fermentation strategy to help optimize your process and maximize efficiency.

Learn What We Do

At Your Service

"Our Commitment"

Your success is our measure of success.

We Deliver

Helping clients achieve milestones on time.

Consultative Approach

Collaborating closely to meet your project needs.

Innovative

Exploring new ideas while ensuring your IP remains yours.

Fermentation capacity

Mini benchtop : 0.2 L (×8) (coming in Spring 2025)

Small benchtop : 3 L (×4), 5 L, 15 L (×2), 20 L (×2)

Steam-in-place : 10 L, 100 L, 200 L (coming before 2026)

Downstream Processing

Continuous centrifugation (coming soon), tangential flow filtration, spray drying, lyophilization

Monitoring & Analysis

Biomass analysis, cell imaging, sugar & metabolite profiling, protein quantification

Organisms we have worked with

Bacteria, budding yeasts, methylotrophic yeasts, fungi

Products we have experience with

Biopolymers, biofertilizers, biopesticides, biofuels, probiotics, recombinant proteins, Insulin, enzymes, acids, plasmid DNA, biological controls

Modes and Control

Run in batch, fed-batch, or continuous mode

Control by dissolved oxygen, pH, temperature, off-gas
